title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
**Introducing the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat - Your Ultimate Winter Companion!**

Stay warm and cozy this winter with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater, designed to provide efficient and safe heating for your home, dorm, office, or kitchen. This compact powerhouse packs a punch, delivering rapid heat in just 2 seconds, thanks to its advanced PTC ceramic heating element.

With three convenient modes to choose from - 750W heating, 1500W heating, and air circulation - you can customize your heating experience to suit your needs. The intuitive controls and built-in thermostat ensure that you can maintain your perfect temperature, while the safe and reliable design provides peace of mind.

Enjoy the following benefits:

* **Effortless Portability**: Weighing just 2.6 pounds, this space heater is easy to move around and place wherever you need it.
* **Ultra-Quiet Operation**: With a noise level below 45 dB, you can enjoy warm and cozy silence.
* **Advanced Safety Features**: Overheat protection and tip-over protection (with automatic shut-off at 45 degrees) ensure your safety and protection.
* **ETL Certified**: Meet the highest safety standards, giving you confidence in your purchase.

Perfect for small to medium-sized spaces (up to 200 square feet), the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater is the ideal solution for:

* Cold winter nights
* Chilly office spaces
* Cozy dorm rooms
* Kitchen warmth

Get ready to experience the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and safety with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater. Order now and stay warm all winter long!

**Introducing the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - The Ultimate Solution for Cozy Comfort**

Stay warm and toasty this winter with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater, designed to provide efficient and safe heating for your home, dorm, office, or kitchen. This powerful and portable ceramic heater fan is ETL certified, ensuring your peace of mind while keeping you cozy.

**Compact yet Mighty**

With its compact size (7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13") and lightweight design (2.6 pounds), this space heater is perfect for small to medium-sized rooms, up to 200 square feet. Its sleek black design blends seamlessly into any d√©cor.

**Three Modes to Suit Your Needs**

Choose from three convenient modes:

* 750W Low Heat for gentle warmth
* 1500W High Heat for rapid warming
* Air Circulation mode for a refreshing breeze

**Advanced Safety Features**

Enjoy worry-free heating with:

* Automatic overheat protection
* Tip-over protection that shuts off at 45 degrees
* PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) heating element for safe and efficient heat generation

**Rapid Heating and Whisper-Quiet Operation**

Get warm in just 2 seconds with our rapid heat generation technology. Plus, our space heater operates at a noise level below 45 dB, ensuring a peaceful environment.

**Additional Features**

* Intuitive controls for easy operation
* Built-in thermostat for precise temperature control
* Portable design for effortless movement
* Low thermal resistance for efficient heat distribution

**Upgrade Your Comfort Today!**

Experience the perfect blend of convenience, safety, and comfort with the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat. Order now and enjoy a warm and cozy winter!

**Introducing the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - Your Ultimate Winter Companion!**

Stay warm and cozy this winter with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater, designed to provide efficient and safe heating for your home, dorm, office, or kitchen. This compact powerhouse packs a punch, delivering rapid heat in just 2 seconds with its advanced PTC ceramic heating element.

**Experience Unparalleled Comfort**

With three modes to choose from - 750W heating, 1500W heating, and air circulation - you can customize your heating experience to suit your needs. The built-in thermostat ensures that your desired temperature is maintained, while the overheat protection and tip-over protection (which automatically shuts off at 45 degrees) guarantee your safety.

**Compact and Portable**

Weighing just 2.6 pounds and measuring 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13", this space heater is easy to move around and place anywhere in your home. Its sleek black design and compact size make it perfect for small spaces, and its ETL certification ensures that it meets the highest safety standards.

**Enjoy Whisper-Quiet Operation**

Unlike other space heaters, the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater operates at a noise level below 45 dB, ensuring that you can enjoy a peaceful and quiet heating experience.

**Ideal for Any Room**

With its ability to heat up to 200 square feet, this space heater is perfect for any room in your home, office, or dorm. Its intuitive controls, rapid heat generation, and low thermal resistance make it an ideal choice for anyone looking for a reliable and efficient heating solution.

**Get Ready to Stay Warm and Cozy This Winter!**

Order your KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat today and experience the ultimate in winter comfort and convenience!
